system.notes: Contains Integrated Respirator, Comm-link, Photo-Visor, Targeter, Recoil-Suppression Sleeves (recoil gloves), and a Magnetic Harness on the back that can hold one basic weapon. Property of the Adeptus Mechanicus, wearers not aligned to them gain Enemy (Mechanicus) whilst openly wearing or displaying it.
